structured.description: A `PageInfo` class that encapsulates information about pages and elements in a query result. It provides current page number, page limit, total pages, and total elements through Lombok-implemented getters, setters, and toString methods. The `of()` method generates a `PageInfo` object based on pageable and page parameters, providing information on the page number, size, total pages, and total elements within the Pageable object.

items.description: Is a data structure that encapsulates information about pages and elements in a query result. It provides current page number, page limit, total pages, and total elements. The class uses Lombok to implement access modifiers and automatic creation of getters, setters, and toString methods.
items.name: PageInfo

items.description: Generates a `PageInfo` object containing information about the number of pages, page size, total pages, and total elements of a given pageable and page.

params.name: pageable
params.description: page number and size of the page being processed, which is used to calculate the total pages and elements in the PageInfo object returned by the function.

params.name: page
params.description: current page being processed, providing the total number of elements on that page.

returns.description: a `PageInfo` object containing page number, size, total pages, and total elements.

items.name: of
